## CrudFeatures.idType property

What type is used for auto-generated primary keys? - SQL databases typically use auto-incremented numbers, - NoSQL databases tend to use GUID/UUID strings.

Default: `'string'`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
idType: 'string' | 'number';
```
